Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: life-size \life"-size`\, life-sized \life"-sized`\(l[imac]f"s[imac]z`), a. Of full size; of the natural size; of the same size as an original; as, a life-size sculpture; a life-size portrait of the general. [1913 Webster]
life-size adj : being of the same size as an original; "a life-size sculpture" [syn: {lifesize}, {life-sized}, {full-size}]
lifesize adj : being of the same size as an original; "a life-size sculpture" [syn: {life-size}, {life-sized}, {full-size}]
